text: Mabel Doss Day Lea (1856-1906) was a rancher, politician, and businesswoman. She owned and ran a large cattle ranch in Texas, the Day Cattle Ranch Company. Helped establish the New Mexico Military Institute with her husband. Lea served as the lady commissioner of the St. Louis Worlds Fair. She was inducted into the Texas Women's Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1856 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Ranchers from Texas Category:Texas politicians Category:American women in business
title: Mabel Doss Day Lea
